TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TransactedBatchingBehavior extends System.Object implements class System.ServiceModel.Description.IEndpointBehavior

summary.span: 表示為支援交易接收的傳輸最佳化接收作業的行為。

span.span: Represents a behavior that optimizes the receive operations for transports that support transactional receives.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 以這個行為設定的傳輸，會嘗試將數個接收作業批次到一個異動中。A transport that is configured with this behavior attempts to batch several receive operations into one transaction. 如此一來，即可避免在每個接收作業中建立並認可交易時的相對高成本。By doing so, the relatively high cost of creating a transaction and committing it in every receive operation is avoided. ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何在組態檔中將交易的批次處理行為加入至服務。The following example shows how to add the transacted batching behavior to a service in a configuration file. [!code-xml[UETransactedBatchingConfig#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/uetransactedbatchingcode/common/serviceapp.config#0)] 下列範例會示範如何在程式碼中將交易的批次處理行為加入至服務。The following example shows how to add the transacted batching behavior to a service in code. [!code-csharp[UETransactedBatchingCode#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/uetransactedbatchingcode/cs/service.cs#0)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(int32 maxBatchSize) cil managed

param.name: maxBatchSize
param.span: 批次處理的接收作業數目上限。

span.span: The maximum number of receive operations that can be batched together.

summary.span: 使用指定的批次大小，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified batch size.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 傳遞至建構函式 (Constructor) 中的 `maxBatchSize` 值只是提示。The `maxBatchSize` value passed into the constructor is only a hint. 在達到 `maxBatchSize` 之前可能已收到所有的訊息。It is possible that all messages are received before reaching the `maxBatchSize`. 發生這種情形時，就不需要無限期地等待接收其他訊息。When that occurs, it is unnecessary to wait indefinitely for another message to be received. 為了避免這種情況，WCF 會提早認可批次，並開啟新的批次來接收其他訊息。To prevent this from happening, WCF commits the batch early and open a new batch to receive additional messages. 如果沒有其他要接收的訊息，而且已經經過異動逾時值的 20%，就會認可批次。The batch is committed if there are no messages to be received and 20 percent of the transaction time-out value has elapsed. ## Examples 下列程式碼會示範如何指定批次中要處理的訊息數目上限，以建立 的新執行個體。The following code shows how to create a new instance of specifying the maximum number of messages to be processed in a batch. [!code-csharp[UETransactedBatchingCode#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/uetransactedbatchingcode/cs/service.cs#1)]

span.span: is less than 0.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int MaxBatchSize { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.MaxBatchSize : int with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得或設定可在單一交易中一同進行批次處理的接收作業數目上限。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum number of receive operations that can be batched together in one transaction.

value.span: 異動中批次處理的接收作業數目上限。

span.span: The maximum number of receive operations that can be batched together in one transaction.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `maxBatchSize` 值只是提示。The `maxBatchSize` value is only a hint. 在達到 `maxBatchSize` 之前可能已收到所有的訊息。It is possible that all messages are received before reaching the `maxBatchSize`. 發生這種情形時，就不需要無限期地等待接收其他訊息。When that occurs, it is unnecessary to wait indefinitely for another message to be received. 為了避免這種情況，WCF 會提早認可批次，並開啟新的批次來接收其他訊息。To prevent this from happening, WCF commits the batch early and open a new batch to receive additional messages. 如果沒有其他要接收的訊息，而且已經經過異動逾時值的 20%，就會認可批次。The batch is committed if there are no messages to be received and 20 percent of the transaction time-out value has elapsed. ## Examples 下列程式碼會示範如何設定 屬性。The following code shows how to set the property. [!code-csharp[UETransactedBatchingCode#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/uetransactedbatchingcode/cs/snippets.cs#2)]

span.span: is less than 0.

MemberSignature.Value: .method hidebysig newslot virtual instance void System.ServiceModel.Description.IEndpointBehavior.AddBindingParameters(class System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint serviceEndpoint, class System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingParameterCollection bindingParameters) cil managed

param.name: serviceEndpoint
param.span: 套用行為設定的服務端點。

span.span: A service endpoint where behavior settings are applied.

param.name: bindingParameters
param.span: 繫結參數的集合，這些參數可儲存繫結項目建立處理站時所用的資訊。

span.span: A collection of binding parameters that store information used by binding elements to build factories.

summary.span: 將繫結設定套用至指定的服務端點。

span.span: Applies binding settings to the specified service endpoint.
This method cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可讓您新增額外的繫結參數至指定的服務端點。Enables you to add additional binding parameters to the specified service endpoint. 這通常用於使用自訂繫結時。This is normally used when working with a custom binding.

MemberSignature.Value: .method hidebysig newslot virtual instance void System.ServiceModel.Description.IEndpointBehavior.ApplyClientBehavior(class System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint serviceEndpoint, class System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ClientRuntime behavior) cil managed

param.name: serviceEndpoint
param.span: 套用行為設定的服務端點。

span.span: A service endpoint where behavior settings are applied.

param.name: behavior
param.span: 包含異動批次處理行為。

span.span: Contains the transaction batching behavior.

summary.span: 將異動批次處理行為設定套用至指定的服務端點。

span.span: Applies transaction batching behavior settings to the specified service endpoint.
This method cannot be inherited.

MemberSignature.Value: .method hidebysig newslot virtual instance void System.ServiceModel.Description.IEndpointBehavior.ApplyDispatchBehavior(class System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint serviceEndpoint, class System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.EndpointDispatcher endpointDispatcher) cil managed

param.name: serviceEndpoint
param.span: 套用行為設定的服務端點。

span.span: A service endpoint where behavior settings are applied.

param.name: endpointDispatcher
param.span: 用於發送訊息的端點發送

span.span: An endpoint dispatching for dispatching messages

summary.span: 將端點發送器與指定的服務端點相關聯。

span.span: Associates an endpoint dispatcher with the specified service endpoint.
This method cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks WCF 服務端點相關聯的端點發送器會呼叫這個方法。This method is called by WCF to associate a service endpoint with an endpoint dispatcher.

MemberSignature.Value: .method hidebysig newslot virtual instance void System.ServiceModel.Description.IEndpointBehavior.Validate(class System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint serviceEndpoint) cil managed

param.name: serviceEndpoint
param.span: 已驗證批次處理行為的服務端點。

span.span: A service endpoint for which batching behavior is validated.

summary.span: 確認交易的批次處理僅適用於支援交易接收作業的繫結。

span.span: Ensures that transacted batching is applicable only for the bindings that support transacted receive operation.
This method cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要確認批次處理僅適用於支援交易接收作業的繫結的 WCF 會呼叫這個方法。This method is called by WCF to ensure that batching is available only for bindings that support transacted receive operations.
